description:
Binding Snap! and Arduino together


Snap4Arduino 10.3.6
- Full Snap! 10.3.6 inside
- Some changes on...
  - Upgrading Costumes, Examples and Libraries indexs to the new json system
  - Updating Arduino blocks initialization, related to the new Snap primitives management
  - "en" lang issues (thanks @mskicker for your feedback)
  - Creative Robotix lib updated (by Simon @segertonGH , Thanks!)
Note: Current Snap4Arduino connector (chrome extension for Chromebooks and Chrome/Chromium/Edge browsers) are still version 8.0.
